rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新型双特异性抗体有望对抗不断演变的 SARS-CoV-2 变体研究人员开发了针对 SARS-CoV-2 N 端和受体结合域的双特异性抗体，显示出对各种 Omicron 变体的显着中和作用，表明新的 COVID-19 治疗方法的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Novel-bispecific-antibodies-show-promise-against-evolving-SARS-CoV-2-variants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Novel-bispecific-antibodies-show-promise-against-evolving-SARS-CoV-2-variants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=512d8676-cada-48ab-8a05-47cba7dd5dc2 Thu, 09 May 2024 00:38:00 -0400 Novel bispecific antibodies show promise against evolving SARS-CoV-2 variants
产前接触大麻和尼古丁会增加新生儿不良后果的风险最近的一项 JAMA 网络开放研究发现，与不使用或仅使用一种物质相比，产前联合使用尼古丁和大麻会显着增加不良围产期结局的风险，例如高血压、早产和婴儿死亡率升高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Heightened-risk-of-adverse-neonatal-outcomes-from-prenatal-exposure-to-both-cannabis-and-nicotine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Heightened-risk-of-adverse-neonatal-outcomes-from-prenatal-exposure-to-both-cannabis-and-nicotine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f9af20f-b734-4050-af8b-7d9c5b97d7df Thu, 09 May 2024 00:21:00 -0400 Heightened risk of adverse neonatal outcomes from prenatal exposure to both cannabis and nicotine
长期研究显示超加工食品与较高的死亡风险有关大多数超加工食品的较高消费量与较高的死亡风险有关，其中即食肉类、家禽和海鲜产品、含糖饮料、乳制品甜点和高度加工的早餐食品显示出最强的关联，今天在《英国医学杂志》上发现了一项长达 30 年的美国研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Ultra-processed-foods-linked-to-higher-risk-of-death-in-long-term-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Ultra-processed-foods-linked-to-higher-risk-of-death-in-long-term-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2aeb1689-810f-4bba-bef8-ce1d70326f79 Wed, 08 May 2024 23:57:15 -0400 Ultra-processed foods linked to higher risk of death in long-term study
一流药物可以预防脓毒症相关的器官衰竭和死亡一种新药可以通过恢复患者血管的健康来预防与败血症相关的器官衰竭和死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/First-in-class-drug-could-prevent-sepsis-lated-organ-failure-and-death.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/First-in-class-drug-could-prevent-sepsis-lated-organ-failure-and-death.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d10ef972-a564-4528-bed8-3e00556fb0ae Wed, 08 May 2024 23:41:16 -0400 First-in-class drug could prevent sepsis-related organ failure and death
研究发现超级老人的大脑可以抵抗与年龄相关的衰退研究人员探索了超级老人（具有卓越认知能力的老年人）的大脑白质完整性，发现虽然整体白质健康没有显着差异，但超级老人在额叶区域表现出优越的微观结构，这可能解释了他们对认知能力下降的抵抗力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Superagers-brains-resist-age-lated-decline-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Superagers-brains-resist-age-lated-decline-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd0c352b-8b5a-41cd-80c2-a053017e4b91 Wed, 08 May 2024 23:37:00 -0400 Superagers' brains resist age-related decline, study finds
诊断不足且常见：研究强调神经病的隐性代价根据 2024 年 5 月 8 日《神经病学》在线期刊上发表的一项研究，神经病是一种神经损伤，会导致手脚疼痛和麻木，最终导致跌倒、感染甚至截肢，这种神经病非常常见，而且诊断不足。美国神经病学学会的医学杂志。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Underdiagnosed-and-common-Study-highlights-neuropathys-hidden-toll.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Underdiagnosed-and-common-Study-highlights-neuropathys-hidden-toll.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9590e600-b196-44a8-aad0-7413e8e9b902 Wed, 08 May 2024 23:36:54 -0400 Underdiagnosed and common: Study highlights neuropathy's hidden toll
新的研究议程将探讨多布斯决定对未成年人的影响青年生殖公平组织（一个由研究人员和临床医生组成的全国性合作组织）的一份新报告概述了一项研究议程，以研究多布斯决定对未成年人的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/New-research-agenda-to-examine-the-impact-of-Dobbs-decision-on-minors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/New-research-agenda-to-examine-the-impact-of-Dobbs-decision-on-minors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c849591c-4d8c-43be-9d6a-8b5cd84988d0 Wed, 08 May 2024 23:31:46 -0400 New research agenda to examine the impact of Dobbs decision on minors
青少年发病的糖尿病与阿尔茨海默氏症风险较高有关科罗拉多大学安舒茨医学校区肥胖和糖尿病生命历程流行病学 (LEAD) 中心的研究人员进行的一项新研究表明，患有糖尿病的年轻人在以后的生活中患阿尔茨海默病的风险可能明显更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Youth-onset-diabetes-linked-to-higher-Alzheimers-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Youth-onset-diabetes-linked-to-higher-Alzheimers-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=56b157eb-0ea7-48f9-b413-a7bae5a2d91c Wed, 08 May 2024 23:29:06 -0400 Youth-onset diabetes linked to higher Alzheimer's risk
跨物种肝细胞生长可能是移植短缺的解决方案由于病毒感染、酗酒、肥胖或癌症而导致的肝病占全球死亡人数中的二分之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Cross-species-liver-cell-growth-could-represent-a-solution-to-transplant-shortage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Cross-species-liver-cell-growth-could-represent-a-solution-to-transplant-shortage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7fca054-36dc-43cc-8c60-de8f18777521 Wed, 08 May 2024 23:24:09 -0400 Cross-species liver cell growth could represent a solution to transplant shortage
脑机接口将 ALS 患者的大脑活动转化为口语研究人员成功地使用脑机接口直接根据 ALS 患者的大脑活动合成语音，听众的单词识别准确率达到 80%，展示了该接口在帮助严重言语障碍患者进行交流的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Brain-computer-interface-translates-ALS-患者-brain-activity-into-spoken-words.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Brain-computer-interface-translates-ALS-患者-brain-activity-into-spoken-words.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3ec70c2-a6b5-4d1c-b652-24521a16026a Wed, 08 May 2024 23:22:00 -0400 Brain-computer interface translates ALS patient's brain activity into spoken words
